reviews.text:
The train was on time and punctual, however, the attitude of some of the staff was awful when travelling from Penzance to Bodmin Parkway. We weren't sure whether the train lights were off because we should have already been on it or because we had to wait, so we asked the members of staff on the platform. They were not helpful at all - all we got back was a sarcastic, patronising answer as though we were thick: "Well you can't get on yet as the doors aren't open..."
Yep, we could see the doors weren't open, thank you for pointing that out. That wasn't what we asked. 
Talk about customer service - some of your staff really shouldn't be in that line of work!
The new shower facilities for Sleeper passengers are superb. Luxury hotel standard.
Station ok but the Toilets dirty , DISGRACEFUL would not keep pigs in there awful
